GSD.description:
ext4: fix use-after-free in ext4_rename_dir_prepare

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.318 by commit 1a3a15bf6f9963d755270cbdb282863b84839195. For more details please see the references link.
